Projects


Country App

Using React, Node.js, Express and MongoDB I have built a Full Stack application - from the beginning to the end. The App is called Country App, in it you can search for different countries and see the information about each of them and you can also create activities you can do in these countries.

Stack

  • Mongo
  • Express
  • React
  • CSS

E-Market

This E-Commerce was made with 7 developers, for the final work of the Full Stack Bootcamp. The E-Commerce contains what every E-Commerce should have. You can see the products, filter them, create an order and buy. In the Dashboard part, you can create new products, delete products, modify products and view customer orders.

Stack

  • React
  • Node
  • Material UI
  • Express
  • MongoDB
